properties.areaDesc: Waters from Fernandina Beach to St. Augustine FL from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from St. Augustine to Flagler Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from Altamaha Sound GA to Fernandina Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 1 at 9:12AM EST until February 2 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville FL
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 10 to 15 knots, increasing to 20 knots
late this afternoon. Northwest winds 20 to 25 knots with
occasional gusts to Gale Force tonight. Seas 4 to 5 feet with
occasional seas up to 6 feet today, building to 5 to 7 feet with
occasional seas up to 9 feet tonight.

* WHERE...Southeast Georgia and Northeast Florida coastal waters
from Altamaha Sound GA to Flagler Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 10 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will become hazardous to small craft late
this afternoon and tonight.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM EST SUNDAY
